backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user cards with access control, card CRUD helpers, tracking card metadata, ownership, and storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to two actorâ€‘initialization stability improvements with associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling auth, actor initialization, timeouts, error states, and routing between portfolio and cards views.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog form for creating cards with validation, autocomplete suggestions, and backend mutation integration.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Text input with dropdown suggestion filtering, outside-click closing, and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Displays a card with rarity styling, prices, actions, and dialogs for editing, selling, or deleting.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Modal listing crafted cards with rarity badges, metadata, and calculated purchase info.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Form dialog to edit card fields and submit updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary showing error details and a reload option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with copyright text and link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app title, user greeting, and login/logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Always-open modal prompting users to enter and save their name on first setup.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: UI dialog for selling or trading a card, including form handling, rarity styling helpers, and interactions with card-related mutations.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal that displays sold and traded cards with profit/loss calculations, grouping, and expandable trade details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Exposes the query state of actor initialization to let components detect errors or retry actor setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Google authentication logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, cards, transactions, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Displays the user's cards with extensive filtering options and an add-card dialog, using memoized filter extraction and search.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows portfolio metrics including investments, returns, balances, and transaction groups, with modals for sold and crafted cards.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Provides utilities to extract unique card field values and filter suggestion lists for autocomplete.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout utilities for the app.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking current state, known issues, and features related to fixing login-related infinite loading.
